function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long incubation period of up to 27 days increases the risk of asymptomatic transmission and delayed detection.","Impact":"Higher transmission rates and difficulty in identifying and isolating infected individuals.","Mitigation":"Implement widespread testing and monitoring, and enforce strict quarantine measures for high-risk individuals.","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, contact tracing apps, and remote monitoring technologies.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in close contact with high-risk groups.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, and employers."},{"Description":"Workplace classification of high-risk groups poses a significant risk of transmission and infection for employees in these settings.","Impact":"Higher transmission rates and increased likelihood of severe cases among affected employees.","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, provide personal protective equipment (PPE), and enforce physical distancing protocols.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-C disinfection devices, and wearable technology for monitoring physical distancing.","People":"Employees in high-risk workplaces, healthcare workers, and supportive staff.","Owner":"Employers, facility managers, and health and safety professionals."},{"Description":"Higher fatality rates among older and immunocompromised individuals pose a significant risk to these population groups.","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and mortality within high-risk demographic categories.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted vaccination campaigns, promote protective measures, and provide access to healthcare resources for high-risk groups.","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution logistics, telemedicine platforms, and remote healthcare monitoring devices.","People":"Older individuals, immunocompromised patients, and individuals with specific underlying health conditions.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies, and community organizations."}]}
